title: anyone knows this font
content:
I’m searching for a script font with a similar feel as the one that says “The Kitchen”. I think it also was used for a book about Bjork.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091120050753im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kitchen_4087.jpg)

anyone?
